notes: "Story so far: El Borbah discovers that Sam Skank, who was believed to be dead and frozen in a cryonics lab, is indeed alive with his head attached to a tiny new body. Arriving at Janet Skank's house to tell her the news, El Borbah finds a headless client and her whimpering boyfriend."
